Abilities.Name: Run Away
Abilities.Description: Ensures escape from wild Pokemon but the user cannot switch under the effects of Mean Look or Block.

Abilities.Name: Adaptability
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's STAB multiplier from 1.5x to 2.0x instead.

Abilities.Name: Anticipation
Abilities.Description: This ability warns the user if their opponent knows a 1-hit KO or super effective move.

Moves.Name: Tackle
Moves.Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

Moves.Name: Tail Whip
Moves.Description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

Moves.Name: Sand Attack
Moves.Description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

Moves.Name: Quick Attack
Moves.Description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Moves.Name: Swift
Moves.Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Moves.Description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Charm
Moves.Description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Calm Mind
Moves.Description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Moves.Name: Hyper Voice
Moves.Description: The user attacks by letting loose a horribly loud, resounding cry.

Moves.Name: Tera Blast
